summary: This document is an email chain from September 2021 discussing outreach to a person claiming to have information about Ghislaine Maxwell's assistant. The chain involves FBI and NYPD personnel coordinating to contact a potential informant who may assist in the prosecution.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the investigation; her assistant is mentioned as someone with potential information.

events.title: Informant offers information
events.description: An individual contacts law enforcement claiming to have information that can help the prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell, specifically mentioning Maxwell's assistant.

events.title: Law enforcement connects with informant
events.description: A Special Agent from the FBI New York Field Office reports having connected with the informant and plans to speak with them the following night.

keyFacts: In July 2021, an informant contacted law enforcement claiming to have information about Ghislaine Maxwell's assistant that could help the prosecution.
The email chain shows coordination between FBI and NYPD personnel in September 2021 to follow up with this informant.
A Special Agent from the FBI's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk in New York reported making contact with the informant in September 2021.
The informant's message included the phrase 'Kindness Matters' and indicated the assistant had lived with them while working for Ghislaine Maxwell.
